welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Manukau City, a charming destination known for its vibrant culture and breathtaking natural beauty. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ardmore Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ardmore Airport handles all freight and mail shipments.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Auckland International Airport serves all international flights and offers a range of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Auckland International Airport serves all domestic flights within New Zealand and offers a variety of services and facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Simply connect to the network and follow the prompts to get online.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Surfdale Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Surfdale Airport is available for private or chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.
